archimate:BusinessProcess.name: De-activate Off-boarded Preconfigured Services
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Deactivate any services have been pre-configured for the associated party's product specification. This is accomplished by notifying the Service Configuration & Activation to de-activate them.

properties.value: De-activate Off-boarded Preconfigured Services deactivates any services have been pre-configured for the associated party's product specification. This is accomplished by notifying the Service Configuration & Activation to de-activate them. If the deactivated services are the final ones associated with a service specification the Manage Service Exit process is notified for possible removal of the service specification.
